# discord-attachment

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->

## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                                 | Type                                      | Default                |
| -------- | --------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------- | ---------------------- |
| `alt`    | `alt`     | The alt text to show in case the image was unable to load                   | `string \| undefined`                     | `'discord attachment'` |
| `height` | `height`  | The height of the image in pixels                                           | `number \| undefined`                     | `undefined`            |
| `size`   | `size`    | The size of the file.                                                       | `string`                                  | `undefined`            |
| `type`   | `type`    | The type of file the attachment is. 'image' \| 'video' \| 'audio' \| 'file' | `"audio" \| "file" \| "image" \| "video"` | `undefined`            |
| `url`    | `url`     | The URL for the image attachment                                            | `string`                                  | `undefined`            |
| `width`  | `width`   | The width of the image in pixels                                            | `number \| undefined`                     | `undefined`            |
